sentence.Network_en: He hasn't the least foreknowledge of this matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于此事他事先一点也不知道.

sentence.Network_en: She has maintained that the General had foreknowledge of the plot.
sentence.Network_cn: 她坚称将军已经预先知晓了这个阴谋。

sentence.Network_en: In this place you could not feel anything, except pain and foreknowledge of pain.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这种地方, 除了痛和痛的预感以外,你没有别的感觉.

entry.def: If you have foreknowledge of an event or situation, you have some knowledge of it before it actually happens.

example.ex: She has maintained that the General had foreknowledge of the plot.
example.tran: 她坚称将军已经预先知晓了这个阴谋。

means.word_mean: 1. knowledge of an event before it occurs
